job.title: Software Engineer 1
job.description: at paypal nasdaq pypl we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone regardless of background or economic standing has access to affordable convenient and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives were a purposedriven company and our beliefs are the foundation of how we conduct business every day were guided by our core values of inclusion innovation collaboration and wellness collectively these values inspire us to work together as one team with our customers at the center of everything we do and to take care of ourselves each other and the communities in which we live and work we challenge the status quo ask questions and find solutions join us as we enable the hopes dreams and ambitions of millions of people around the worldltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob description summaryltbrgtltstronggtthe paypal identity team is seeking an accomplished software engineer to join our user and business platform team the user and business platforms team mission is to connect our customers to our many experiences in a safe and secure way we provide user account lifecycle services and solutions to make the management of our customers personal andor business identity with paypal efficient and secureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob descriptionltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt bs in computer science or related degreeltligtltligt years experienceltligtltligt prior experience in working on large systemsltligtltligt interest in developing high performance scalable and highly available servicesltligtltligt good knowledge in java programmingltligtltligt knowledge of rest and best practices in designing and developing apisltligtltligt understanding of http ssl tcpip protocolsltligtltligt work in a team environment with a globally distributed teamltligtltligt assist in producing technical documentation review them with wide audience including managers domain leads architects site ops etcltligtltligt knowledge of common data structures and design patternsltligtltligt strong written and communication skillsltligtltligt strong desire to learn push the envelope and share knowledge with othersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtfor more than years paypal has remained at the forefront of the digital payment revolution by leveraging technology to make financial services and commerce more convenient affordable and secure our open digital payments platform gives paypals million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships paypal creates better ways to manage and move money and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments paying or getting paid available in more than markets around the world the paypal platform including braintree venmo and xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than currencies withdraw funds in currencies and hold balances in their paypal accounts in currenciesltbrgtltbrgtpaypal provides equal employment opportunity eeo to all persons regardless of age color national origin citizenship status physical or mental disability race religion creed gender sex pregnancy sexual orientation gender identity andor expression genetic information marital status status with regard to public assistance veteran status or any other characteristic protected by federal state or local law in addition paypal will provide reasonable
